channel.title: Reapage scape v2 with thread fix
channel.description:
100% Credits to Storm Cutter and The Reaper X Well this is my favourite source ever and I noticed that something happened to StormCutters tutorial and I was like I have got a reapage server I added that tut to awhile ago.
Basically this tut stops Syipkers, allgofree all that shit nulls etc in their tracks. For info on what the server is like visit here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,296222.0.html Which is the thread about Reapage scape.
It might need a bit of cleaning (Commands Cough) but its worth it. Its a fun pking base source and I really think we need to get some more on the server status checker.
Few things that u might wanna know: There is a trading glitch where you can dupe It can be laggy. You might wanna take out the Npcs talking (Npchandler process) as this causes lag. Things like that. Check out the process and u might find things u can remove to reduce lag as well.
Have fun with this. Tatemo
REMEMBER: 100% CREDITS TO STORMCUTTER AND THE REAPER X I ONLY MERGED THEM
Here is download: http://www.mediafire.com/?zyey0z22owg
No client needed just use Silabsofts.
